notes: mass noun; usually uncountable; plural 'acque' for bodies of water

example_sentence_english: I would like a water please.

notes: plural used for bodies of water and poetic contexts
example_sentence_italian: Le acque del lago sono calme.
example_sentence_english: The waters of the lake are calm.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono delle acque termali qui.
example_sentence_english: There are some thermal waters here.
